job.title: Application Engineer
job.description:
Job Summary
Client located just west of Chicago is looking for an Applications engineer in the automation industry. This individual will have experience with automated systems primarily in the Material Handling field. This individual will be the technical liaison between sales and the customer. Salary will be based on experience.
Bachelors in Engineering
Experience designing automated systems
Experienced in Microsoft products
location: Melrose Park, Illinois
job type: Permanent
salary: $70,000 - 100,000 per year
work hours: 8am to 4pm
education: Bachelors
Responsibilities
Develop Automated Systems used in the material handling industry
Create proposal documents that fully describe and define the solution.
Compile, review, and process incoming information and specifications for new projects.
Assist Sales Engineers and our customers by answering technical questions related to our products.
Review and integrate internal documents.
